Actions.Text: COMMITTEE DISCHARGED AND COMMITTED TO RULES

Title: Permits the commissioner of health to designate local health officials to request copies of certain reports and records
Summary: Permits the commissioner of health to designate local health officials to request copies of certain reports and records relating to a death.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the county law, in relation to permitting the commissioner of health to designate local health officials to request copies of certain reports and records
